channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Stock market today: World shares mostly advance after Wall St comeback from worst loss since 2022
item.description: Shares are mostly higher in Europe and Asia after Wall Street made a patchy comeback from its worst loss since 2022.

item.title: Wood pellets boomed in the US South. Climate activists want Biden to stop boosting industry growth
item.description: Wood pellet production has skyrocketed across the U.S. South to feed the European Unionâ€™s push for renewable energy to replace fossil fuels.

item.title: Rebuilding Rome, the upstate New York city that is looking forward after a destructive tornado
item.description: A tornado that touched down in the small, upstate New York city of Rome ripped roofs from houses, reduced brick buildings to rubble and toppled steeples from two historic churches.
